nodes.text: Archaeo-Prime was a structure located on the Cosmatanic Steppes, a mantle of land suspended over a gas giant in the Outer Rim Territories. Archaeo-Prime was maintained by the Archaeological Association.

After Doctor Aphra killed and stole an artifact from Ulbik Tan, she flew the Ark Angel II to Archaeo-Prime on the Cosmatanic Steppes. There, she attempted to sell the artifact, but could not due to her doctorate being under review due to her shady "finds" on Boothi XII.
Angry and confused, Doctor Aphra found her father, Korin Aphra, who revealed that he leaked the info, so she could help him find the Ordu Aspectu. They then departed on the Ark Angel II to find it.
